name: Dream Test MV version[jam version]
description:
Hi, this is my second project which is made for week in this time. 
This game has only 3 endings, but I'll add more only in Ren'py version.
I hope you like it, sis-bro!  STORY

Once upon a time, a girl, who named AnasiUnika, also known as AU, decided to go on adventure with her friend Kortun-kun. But suddenly the Void appeared before them and swallowed them. Somehow they survived and ended up in a Flipside, the city that will soon be swallowed up by this void. Help AU and her cat save the day!

Characters:

Villains(only one):

All characters, locations, music, sounds are belong to their own owners!

Art by AnasiUnika(me)

NOTE:

It has memes

Made for Crossover Jam
